title: Kate Green – 2021 Comments on Teacher Numbers
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Kate Green, the Shadow Secretary State for Education, on 23 May 2021.
content:
Teachers have experienced a decade of neglect under Conservative governments which is driving them out of classrooms.
